snippet: The junior players from across the world -- 128 boys and 128 girls in the tournament, and more involved in qualifying -- are often focused on one of two prizes: a professional career or a college tennis scholarship.
abstract: The junior players from across the world -- 128 boys and 128 girls in the tournament, and more involved in qualifying -- are often focused on one of two prizes: a professional career or a college tennis scholarship.

headline.main: College Coaches Keep Busy at Junior Tournament
